name: Samurai vs Ninja Watch
description:
*** Amazing sword fight on your watch ***
* You are the young samurai doing your mission
* But all of sudden, you're surrounded by a group of ninjas
* Hack, Slash, do whatever you need to survive!!!
* Upgrade your HP, Damage, Critical chance...
* Auto save game, play anytime
* No need your phone, play on watch only
* save your samurai, GET IT NOW
